Bond Potentials

Detailed Description

template<class Interaction>
class DdMd::BondPotentialImpl< Interaction >

Implementation template for a BondPotential.

Definition at line 245 of file ddMd/potentials/bond/BondPotentialImpl.h.

template<class Interaction >
void DdMd::BondPotentialImpl< Interaction >::readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read potential energy parameters.

This method reads the bond potential Interaction parameter block. Before calling Interaction::readParam(), it passes simulation().nBondType() to Interaction::setNAtomType().

Reimplemented from Util::ParamComposite.
